'''Fantastic Voyage''' is the first act of [[Bennett]]'s [[Hangout Event]]. In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, must have completed [[Prologue]] Act III: [[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]], and reached [[Adventure Rank]] 26.

==Description==
You meet a passionate adventurer at the front desk of the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild.

==Endings==
{{Hangout Event Endings
|character    = Bennett
|act          = 1
|ending1      = Fruitless Anticipation
|ending1_text = "Well, of course discounts weren't going to be that easy to come by..."
|ending2      = Hasty Farewell
|ending2_text = That is a misfortune of great enough magnitude to change even the weather.
|ending3      = Taste Tester Royce
|ending3_text = Should you say that it was... fortunate that Royce ate that first?
|ending4      = Ready to Make Sacrifices
|ending4_text = You shook misfortune off for a time, but the price for it was...
|ending5      = No Wonder It's a Top-Class Commission
|ending5_text = As expected of an A-Rank commission! One misstep and we're stuck in here!
|ending6      = Fortunate Outcome
|ending6_text = Perhaps it was your goodwill that allowed you to snatch hold of some good luck amid all that misfortune.
